name: Swing&Knock
description:
Hit the ball with good timing and defeat the pitcher!
It is game over when you hit a bomb.

・ Normal enemies can be defeated by hitting 3 balls.
・ Boss can be defeated by hitting 5 balls.
・ If you hit back at perfect timing, it will be 3 balls worth.
・ It will be cleared if you defeat the number of enemys.

Please aim at homerun and swing!
